__e: "I believe he really likes you," said the girl.
I've never told you, but I really like you, you know?
That's because you really like me.
If your wife's attracted to me, I think that's your problem not mine.
For some reason, guys I'm interested in, or guys interested in me, always have something seriously wrong with them.
The important question is, does his mother like you?
I wonder... I don't know... But perhaps she does fancy me a bit.
You're the boss, if you don't like me..
I've got a feeling your mother doesn't approve of this.
And if I like it around here, I plan to drop again.
- No, I really dig it here 'cause I can say anything I want, man!
I don't want to leave, I like it here.
Yes. They also see that women really like me.
You turn me on alright, but I can't.
You're a nice girl, I like you a lot.
You haven't much choice, have you? I don't know. I'm getting quite fond of this place.
And I'm sure that you can see I dig you pretty good, too, right?
I like it here. It doesn't mean 'cause I go here, I'm a genius. I am smart.
